Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Johannes Zauner. Author, maintainer.

  • Manuel Spitschan. Author.

  • Steffen Hartmeyer. Author.

  • European Partnership on Metrology. Funder.
    The project (22NRM05 MeLiDos) has received funding from the European Partnership on Metrology, co-financed by the European Union's Horizon Europe Research and Innovation Programme, EURAMET, and the Participating States. Views and opinions expressed are those of the authors and do not necessarily reflect those of the European Union or EURAMET.

  • Wellcome Trust. Funder.
    LightLogR's development is supported by the Wellcome Trust (www.wellcome.org), 226787/2/22/Z.

  • Reality Labs Research. Funder.
    LightLogR's development is supported by the GLEE project (Global Light Exposure Engine, www.visualdiet.org) funded by Reality Labs Research.

  • Translational Sensory and Circadian Neuroscience Unit (MPS/TUM/TUMCREATE). Copyright holder.
    www.tscnlab.org

Source: inst/CITATION
